scripts.manifest:local: npm run manifest -- local local-31337-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:testing: npm run manifest -- testing testing-80001-0 && npm run codegen
scripts.manifest:testing:goerli: npm run manifest -- testing testing-5-0 && npm run codegen

scripts.deploy:local: npm run manifest:local && npm run create:local && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 boson/corecomponents -l 0.0.1
scripts.deploy:testing: npm run manifest:testing && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --product hosted-service --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ bosonprotocol/mumbai-testing
